overview: Larry Weintraub’s 25 years of entertainment marketing experience has provided him with keen insight into the relationship between the brand and the consumer. His focus in areas including internet strategy, social media, advertising, merchandising, and event management, led him to launch Fanscape, Inc., one of the first online marketing organizations. An accomplished executive, former Vice President of Artist Development and A&R at A&M Records, and the recipient of several professional and personal awards, Larry is recognized as a leading industry expert. Larry has an Economics degree from the University of California, San Diego.
